level.heading: Volatile content of solid fuel restricted.
level.text: ยง 24-172 Volatile content of solid fuel restricted. (a) No person shall cause or permit the use of solid fuel as the normal boiler fuel which contains more volatile matter by weight in any part thereof than: (1) If used in equipment which is hand-fed, fourteen percent; or (2) If used in equipment which is mechanically fed, thirty-two percent. (b) Volatile matter shall be calculated on a moisture and ash-free basis.
